summary: Iteration 42 - Comprehensive testing of batch changes: Voice Studio unified card grid, Account page mobile layout, News Detail mobile metadata, Discover page podcast features, hashtag TagPills, and settings persistence. Backend 100% (7/7 passed), Frontend ~90% with TagPills verified on News Detail page.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS (Test 1): Account page (/account) - Redesigned with metric cards, no horizontal overflow on 375px mobile viewport (scrollWidth=clientWidth=375)
PASS (Test 2): Voice Studio page (/voices) - Unified VOICE_MATRIX card grid with 5 voice cards (voice-card-onyx, voice-card-echo, voice-card-nova, etc.)
PASS (Test 3a): Voice Studio - 5 broadcast language tags found (broadcast-lang-en, broadcast-lang-pcm, broadcast-lang-yo, broadcast-lang-ha, broadcast-lang-ig)
PASS (Test 3b): Voice Studio - 5 voice preview buttons found (voice-preview-*)
PASS (Test 4): Voice Studio - APPLY_MODEL button (apply-voice-btn) visible at bottom of page
PASS (Test 5a): News Detail page mobile - mobile-article-metadata section visible on 375px viewport
PASS (Test 5b): News Detail page mobile - metadata is OPEN by default (mobile-queue-btn visible immediately)
PASS (Test 6): Discover page - podcast-search-input exists and is visible
PASS (Test 7): Discover page - 9 podcast category filter buttons (ALL + 8 categories: geopolitics, technology, urban, environment, finance, health, climate, culture)
PASS (Test 8): Discover page - Clicking podcast card expands episode detail panel (podcast-detail-{id})
PASS (Test 9-10): TagPill hashtags - Found 3 TagPills on desktop News Detail sidebar, 1 in mobile metadata section. DashboardPage uses TagPill component for news card tags
PASS (Test 12): Backend - GET /api/podcasts/search?q=arctic returns results with matching title
PASS (Test 13): Backend - POST/GET /api/settings/guest saves and retrieves settings correctly with merge behavior

success_rate.frontend: 92% (12/13 features verified - TagPills on Dashboard need session refresh for full verification)

test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' on landing page
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 42 tested all batch changes. Voice Studio unified card grid works with 5 voice cards showing voice name, accent, language badge, status, and preview button. Account page has proper mobile layout without overflow. News Detail mobile metadata (data-testid='mobile-article-metadata') is OPEN by default with useState(true). Discover page has full podcast functionality with search, 8 category filters, and expandable episode details. TagPill component in HashtagText.js creates clickable hashtags with data-testid='hashtag-{tag}' that navigate to /search. Settings API supports localStorage + MongoDB sync with merge behavior.
